channel.title: Roundabout on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Roundabout on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: High Plains Road Roundabout At I-25 Onramp
item.description: High Plains Road Roundabout at I-25 (Exit 4) onramp at I-25 North/Cheyenne/Port of Entry.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 4 Offramp
item.description: I-25 South Exit 4 offramp approaching roundabout. Use roundabout for access to West High Plains Road, I-25 South/Fort Collins, Welcome Center, and I-25 North/Cheyenne.

item.title: I-70 East Exit 19 Offramp at CO-340
item.description: I-70 East Exit 19 Offramp at CO-340 in Fruita. Use CO-340 West to Fruita and Rest Area. Use CO-340 East to Colorado National Monument.

item.title: US-59 South/BL-90 West at MN-60/CH-33 - Roundabout
item.description: US-59 South/BL-90 West at MN-60/CH-33 roundabout in Worthington. US-59 South joins MN-60 Westbound. BL-90 East joins MN-60 Eastbound.

item.title: US-59 South/BL-90 East Approaching MN-60
item.description: US-59 South/BL-90 East approaching MN-60 roundabout.

item.title: MN-60 West at US-59 and CH-33
item.description: MN-60 West at US-59 and CH-33 roundabout in Worthington. US-59 South joins MN-60 westbound.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 45 Offramp at MN-60/BL-90 Roundabout
item.description: I-90 East - Exit 45 Offramp at MN-60/BL-90 roundabout. Use BL-90 West/MN-60 South to Worthington; MN-60 north to Windom.

item.title: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South - Roundabout
item.description: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South entering roundabout at Hoback Junction. Use US-26 West/US-89 South for Alpine Jct.; use US-189/US-191 South for Pinedale.

item.title: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South Approaching Hoback Jct.
item.description: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South approaching roundabout at Hoback Junction.

item.title: End NV-439 South at US-50
item.description: End NV-439 South at US-50 Roundabout in Lyon County. Exit roundabout for US-50 West to Carson City.

item.title: End NV-439 South at US-50 Roundabout
item.description: End NV-439 South at US-50 Roundabout in Lyon County. Use US-50 East for Fallon; US-50 West for Carson City.

item.title: Alt. US-50 West/Alt. US-95 South at US-50
item.description: Alt. US-50 West/Alt. US-95 South at US-50. This is the western end of Alt. US-50. Normally the shields for the Alternate routes in Nevada do not spell out the text ALTERNATE - instead they usually read ALT.

item.title: NV-227 West Approaching Roundabout in Spring Creek
item.description: NV-227 West approaching Licht Parkway and Spring Creek Parkway roundabout in Spring Creek.

item.title: US-26 East - US-89/US-189/US-191 North in Hoback Jct. Roundabout
item.description: US-26 East - US-89/US-189/US-191 North in Hoback Jct. Roundabout. Merge right for (US-189 South/US-191 South) Pinedale.

item.title: US-26 East/US-89 North Approaching US-189/US-191
item.description: US-26 East/US-89 North Approaching US-189/US-191 roundabout at Hoback Junction. Use first exit in roundabout for US-189/US-191 South to Pinedale; second exit in roundabout for US-89/US-189/US-191 North/US-26 East to Jackson.

item.title: Alt. US-95 North/Alt. US-50 East/BL-80 East - Roundabout
item.description: Approaching roundabout on Alt. US-95 North/Alt. US-50 East/BL-80 East. Roundabout for BL-80 East/To I-80/Alt. US-95 North/Elko; Alt. US-50 East to Fallon; (NV-828)/Farm District Road.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-439 North
item.description: US-50 West Roundabout at NV-439 North/USA Parkway

item.title: US-50 West at NV-439 Roundabout
item.description: US-50 West at NV-439 roundabout in Lyon County. Use US-50 West for Carson City; use NV-439 North for Clark; South Opal Ave. also enters the roundabout here.

item.title: Alt. US-50 West/Alt. US-95 South - US-50
item.description: Alt. US-50 West/Alt. US-95 South at US-50. Currently there is a construction project to replace the intersection with a roundabout. Use US-50 West for Carson City; US-50 East for Fallon; Alt. US-95 South for Yerington. This is the western end of Alt. US-50.

item.title: Alt. US-95 South/Alt. US-50 West/BL-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on Alt. US-95 South/Alt. US-50 West/BL-80 West. Distance to Reno (via I-80), Yerington, and Carson City.

item.title: Alt. US-50 West Approaching Alt. US-95/NV-828/BL-80
item.description: Alt. US-50 West Approaching Alt. US-95/NV-828/BL-80 roundabout in Fernley. Use Alt. US-95 North/To I-80/(BL-80) to Reno; Alt. US-95 South/Alt. US-50 West/(BL-80) to Fernley; and (NV-828) for Farm District Road.

item.title: US-50 East at NV-439 Roundabout
item.description: US-50 East at NV-439 (USA Parkway) Roundabout in Lyon County. Use US-50 East for Fallon; NV-439 North for Clark (I-80 Jct.); turn south for South Opal Ave.

item.title: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout in Pincher Creek. Merge right for AB-6 South.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout
item.description: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek. Use AB-6 North for AB-3 (Crowsnest Highway); use AB-6 south for Waterton Park; use AB-507 West for Beaver Mines and Castle Mountain.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507
item.description: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-507 Junction
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-507 West Junction in a roundabout. Merge right for AB-507 west.

item.title: Freya St. South at Future US-395 North
item.description: Freya St. South at Future US-395 North. Use Future US-395 north for Colville and US-2.

item.title: End Future US-395 South Approaching Freya St.
item.description: End Future US-395 South approaching Freya St. roundabout.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout in Colville. Merge right for Railroad St. south to (Colville) City Center. Merge left to continue on US-395 south, which is incorrectly signed as WA-395.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad Street Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East at Railroad Street Roundabout in Colville.

item.title: Begin WA-548 South at I-5
item.description: Begin WA-548 South at I-5. Turn right for I-5 north to (Peace Arch) Border Crossing. Continue through roundabout for D St., and WA-548 South/(Blaine)City Center.

item.title: WA-548 North Approaching I-5 North Onramp
item.description: WA-548 North approaching I-5 North Onramp. Use I-5 north for (Peace Arch) Border Crossing. Continue through roundabout for 2nd St. (to Peace Arch State Park) and D St.

item.title: WA-548 North at I-5 South
item.description: WA-548 North at I-5 South (Exit 276) onramp.

item.title: WA-548 - Grandview Road Roundabout
item.description: Roundabout on WA-548 (Grandview Road). Go north on roundabout to continue north on WA-548; west to continue on Grandview Road; north for the (Cherry Point) BP Refinery.

item.title: US-395 North on WA-240 Offramp
item.description: US-395 on WA-240 offramp approaching roundabout. Use right lane for Columbia Drive. Use any lane for WA-240 west to Richland.

item.title: WA-243 North - Mattawa Roundabout
item.description: WA-243 North at roundabout in Mattawa. Use right side of roundabout for Mattawa, left side to Rd 24 SW.

item.title: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South in Hoback Jct. Roundabout
item.description: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South in Hoback Jct. roundabout. Merge right for (US-26 West/US-89 South) Alpine Junction.

item.title: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South - Roundabout
item.description: US-26 West - US-89/US-189/US-191 South entering roundabout at Hoback Junction. Use US-26 West/US-89 South for Alpine Jct.; use US-189/US-191 South for Pinedale. This intersection was converted to a roundabout in 2012.

item.title: NV-227 West - Spring Creek Parkway and Licht Parkway
item.description: NV-227 west approaching roundabout at Spring Creek Parkway and Licht Parkway.

item.title: NE-53E Link - Roundabout
item.description: Roundabout on NE-53E Link. Enter roundabout for To NE-71 and I-80, Gering, and Scottsbluff. The roundabout only connects two segments of NE-53E Link. Notice the usage of the word I-80 instead of a shield.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - South Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - south exit of the Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412 West/US-385 South to Clayton, NM and Dalhart, TX. This sign is white as opposed to the usual green sign.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 - West Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 the west exit of the Boise City Roundabout. Turn right for OK-325 West to Kenton.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East at US-385/OK-325
item.description: Roundabout diagram in front of the Cimarron County Courthouse in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - East Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at east exit of Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East to Guymon and Amarillo, Texas.

item.title: NM-460/NM-478 Roundabout
item.description: Roundabout at NM-460/NM-478 junction. Merge right to continue south on NM-460; continue through roundabout for NM-460 north.

item.title: NM-478 South at NM-478/NM-460 Roundabout
item.description: NM-478/NM-478 roundabout on NM-478 south.

item.title: To WA-125 in Walla Walla
item.description: To WA-125 at W. Pine St./Myra Road roundabout. Turn right for WA-125.

item.title: Myra Road South at Heritage Road/W. Pine St. Roundabout
item.description: Myra Road South at Heritage Road/W. Pine St. roundabout. Use right lane for Heritage Road. Use left lane to WA-125/Prescott/Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: Myra Road Roundabout at US-12
item.description: Myra Road roundabout on north side of US-12/To WA-125 interchange. Merge right for US-12 west onramp. Continue through roundabout for US-12 east. Myra Road is part of a short spur that connects US-12 with WA-125.

item.title: US-12 East at WA-125 Offramp
item.description: US-12 East at WA-125 offramp. Merge left onto roundabout for WA-125 (spur) to Prescott and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: US-93 North - Tegner St. Roundabout
item.description: US-93 north at the Tegner St. roundabout. US-93 used to follow Tegner St. into downtown Wickenburg, until the bypass was completed in 2009.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching Tegner St.
item.description: US-93 north approaching Tegner St. roundabout. Continue north on US-93 for Kingman and Las Vegas.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93 at roundabout. This is a new alignment for US-60 and US-93, which moves a major intersection from the downtown area of Wickenburg

item.title: Alt. US-95/BL-80 In Fernley Roundabout
item.description: Alt. US-95/Alt. US-50/BL-80 in Fernley roundabout. Turn right for Alt. US-95 North/BL-80.

item.title: Alt. US-95 at Alt. US-50 In Fernley Roundabout
item.description: BL-80/Alt. US-50 East/Alt. US-95 North at Alt. US-50 split in roundabout.

item.title: Alt. US-95 North/Alt. US-50 East Approaching Split
item.description: BL-80/Alt. US-50 East/Alt. US-95 North approaching roundabout. Alt. US-50 East traffic leaves here towards Fallon. Alt. US-95 North traffic follows BL-80 towards I-80 and Elko. Farm District Road (NV-828) leaves to the south. This roundabout is a recent development in Fallon.

item.title: ID-54 East at Farragut SP Traffic Circle
item.description: ID-54 east at a roundabout in Farragut State Park. Through traffic stay to the right towards Bayview. West bound ID-54 traffic towards Athol stay left.
